description: Try our easy to follow Beef Ragout With Sweet Potato Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef Ragout With Sweet Potato Mash
name: Beef Ragout With Sweet Potato Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup Campbell's Real Beef Liquid Stock Salt Reduced

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon mash into shallow bowls. Top with ragout. Sprinkle with thyme and parmesan. Serve with green beans.
